body:
In description of its ability they can deal damage to player or creature instead of player only.
Also if marauders enchanted with Temporal Isolation their ability deals damage to player (dmg is not prevented).
author: [OLEGtheK...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/106579007142717194127/)
title: Keldon Marauders bug

comments.body:
Thanks for spotting the bug.

The card correctly targets only a player but the description given by the game was wrong. I fixed that part.

Now to the thing you describe with Temporal Isolation:
I think this is correct behavior because the moment the "when leaves play" trigger triggers, the attachment is gone and so the damage is no longer prevented. I could be wrong though as timing in this game gets complicated. If you feel that the interaction between Keldon Marauders and Temporal Isolation is still wrong, please open a new issue for that part alone, so we can track one bug per issue.

Thank you.

**Status:** Fixed
